name: Out Of The Classroom
description:
You play as a student who was kicked out of their classroom and now wants to escape their school.

Unluckily for them, their school has a lot of Teachers walking through the halls, so they'll need to escape this school without getting caught by the teachers.

Made with CopperCube 6.3.

CONTROLS :

-WSDA to move around.

-Directionnal arrows to move Camera.

-SHIFT to run.
